mapper.select: SELECT p.pid as pid, b.bno as bno, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall, p.pno as pno, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pdetail as pdetail, p.pseason as pseason, p.ptotalamount as ptotalamount FROM product p, brand b WHERE pid = #{pid} AND b.bno = p.bno
SELECT pid, ccolorcode, cimage1, cimage2, cimage3, ccolorimage, cmatchpid FROM color WHERE pid = #{pid}
mapper.insert: insert into product(pid, bno, pno, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, pprice, pdetail, pseason, ptotalamount) values(#{pid}, #{bno}, seq_pno.nextval, #{clarge}, #{cmedium}, #{csmall}, #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{pdetail}, #{pseason}, 0)

insert into product(pid, bno, pno, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, pprice, pdetail, pseason, ptotalamount) values(#{pid}, #{bno}, #{pno}, #{clarge}, #{cmedium}, #{csmall}, #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{pdetail}, #{pseason}, #{ptotalamount})
insert into color(pid, ccolorcode, cimage1, cimage2, cimage3, ccolorimage, cmatchpid) values(#{pid}, #{ccolorcode}, #{cimage1}, #{cimage2}, #{cimage3}, #{ccolorimage}, #{cmatchpid})
insert into stock(pid, ccolorcode, ssize, samount) values(#{pid}, #{ccolorcode}, #{ssize}, #{samount})
mapper.select: SELECT p.pid as pid, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall, p.pno as pno, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pdetail as pdetail, p.pseason as pseason, p.ptotalamount as ptotalamount FROM product p, brand b WHERE pno = #{pno} AND b.bno = p.bno
mapper.delete: delete from color where pid=#{pid} and ccolorcode=#{color}
delete from stock where pid=#{pid} and ccolorcode=#{color} and ssize=#{size}
mapper.select: select exid, orderno, eximg from exhibition order by orderno

and pname like concat('%'||#{keyword}, '%')

SELECT rnum, pno, pid, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, bname, pprice FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pno, pid, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pname, bname, pprice FROM( select p.pno as pno, p.pid as pid, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall, p.pname as pname, b.bname as bname, p.pprice as pprice from product p, brand b where p.bno = b.bno
and pname like concat('%'||#{product.keyword}, '%')
and pid like concat('%'||#{product.keyword}, '%')
and bname like concat('%'||#{product.keyword}, '%')
order by p.pno ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pager.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{pager.startRowNo}
